item.title: Strat's Surmount Speedrun Guide
item.description: Links Terminology Pathing Tutorial skip / Speedrun mode Tricks Juan Arm Climb Juan Hop Links ¶ Speedrun.com Surmount Page Terminology ¶ TBD Let’s name all the “things” in the game. Pathing ¶ Tutorial skip / Speedrun mode ¶ Importance: Essential Difficulty: Easy Secret path that skips the tutorial and decreases the number of cutscenes you need to button through. I learned this from @miphos on Discord. Tricks ¶ Juan Arm Climb ¶ Other names: Popeye Special
